name: Bcleenders.github.io
body:
###Hello, world!

Now that you're on this page, I think it'd be best if I gave you some info on myself...

I'm a Computer Science student, with interests ranging from coding (Ruby, Javascript, Java and Go) to philosophy of technology and education.

###Projects
To see some of my code "in the wild", check out the projects listed below:
* [**Sciencechallenges**](http://sciencechallenges.nl/) is a platform to support the Challenges initiative. It's a student initiative at Twente University to enhance education by challenging students to participate in academic challenges. You can also view the code (it's open-source!) on [GitHub](https://github.com/boersmamarcel/challengesplatform)
* [**AI tick-tack-toe bot**](http://bcleenders.github.io/AI-tic-tac-toe-browser/) I wrote this as a small proof of concept, to show how easy it is to teach a computer simple tasks. Beware: here be dragons! I did not waste my time optimizing the code, so the results are not as good as they could have been...
* [**Norvig Web Data Science Award submission**](https://github.com/bcleenders/norvig-award) A program I wrote with one of my fellow students as a submission for a big data contest organized by SURFsara and Common Crawl. When I participated, I was a second-year student and hadn't had a single course on big data yet: everything you see was taught with YouTube and man-pages.

###Contact
Feel free to contact me by [mail](mailto:bcleenders@gmail.com) or to look me up on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/bram-leenders/42/1b0/275).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
